trans-unit.source: Controls when the internal debug console should open.
trans-unit.target: 控制何时打开内部调试控制台。

trans-unit.source: Background color for the highlight of line at the top stack frame position.
trans-unit.target: 堆栈帧中顶部一行的高亮背景色。

trans-unit.source: Background color for the highlight of line at focused stack frame position.
trans-unit.target: 堆栈帧中焦点一行的高亮背景色。

trans-unit.source: This {0} has a {1} that will get lost on remove. Consider enabling the {0} instead.
trans-unit.target: 此{0}的{1}将在删除后丢失。请考虑仅启用此{0}。

trans-unit.source: This {0} has a {1} that will get lost on remove. Consider disabling the {0} instead.
trans-unit.target: 此{0}的{1}将在删除后丢失。请考虑仅禁用此{0}。
删除第 {0} 列的内联断点
编辑第 {0} 列的内联断点
禁用第 {0} 列的内联断点
启用第 {0} 列的内联断点
未验证断点的图标颜色。

trans-unit.source: Icon color for the current breakpoint stack frame.
trans-unit.target: 当前断点堆栈帧的图标颜色。

trans-unit.source: Icon color for all breakpoint stack frames.
trans-unit.target: 所有断点堆栈帧的图标颜色。

trans-unit.note: Debug is a noun in this context, not a verb.

trans-unit.target: 聚焦到“调试控制台”视图
trans-unit.note: Debug is a noun in this context, not a verb.

trans-unit.source: Type the name of a launch configuration to run.
trans-unit.target: 键入准备运行的启动配置的名称。

trans-unit.source: Allow setting breakpoints in any file.
trans-unit.target: 允许在任何文件中设置断点。
trans-unit.note: This is the description for a setting

trans-unit.source: Automatically open the explorer view at the end of a debug session.
trans-unit.target: 在调试会话结束时自动打开资源管理器视图。
trans-unit.note: This is the description for a setting

trans-unit.source: Show variable values inline in editor while debugging.
trans-unit.target: 当处于调试过程中时，在编辑器中内联显示变量值。
trans-unit.note: This is the description for a setting

trans-unit.source: Controls the location of the debug toolbar. Either `floating` in all views, `docked` in the debug view, or `hidden`.
trans-unit.target: 控制调试工具栏的位置。可在所有视图中“浮动”、在调试视图中“停靠”，也可“隐藏”。
trans-unit.note: This is the description for a setting

trans-unit.source: Never show debug in status bar
trans-unit.target: 在状态栏中不再显示调试

trans-unit.source: Always show debug in status bar
trans-unit.target: 始终在状态栏中显示调试

trans-unit.source: Show debug in status bar only after debug was started for the first time
trans-unit.target: 仅于第一次启动调试后在状态栏中显示调试

trans-unit.source: Controls when the debug status bar should be visible.
trans-unit.target: 控制何时显示调试状态栏。
trans-unit.note: This is the description for a setting

trans-unit.source: Controls if the debug console should be automatically closed when the debug session ends.
trans-unit.target: 控制调试控制台是否应在调试会话结束时自动关闭。

trans-unit.source: Controls when the debug view should open.
trans-unit.target: 控制何时打开“调试”视图。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the non-debug hovers should be enabled while debugging. When enabled the hover providers will be called to provide a hover. Regular hovers will not be shown even if this setting is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 控制调试过程中是否启用非调试悬停提示。启用后，将调用悬停提供程序来提供悬停提示。即使启用此项设置，普通悬停提示也不会显示。
trans-unit.note: This is the description for a setting

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the debug sub-sessions are shown in the debug tool bar. When this setting is false the stop command on a sub-session will also stop the parent session.
trans-unit.target: 控制调试子会话是否显示在调试工具栏中。当此设置为 false 时, 子会话上的 stop 命令也将停止父会话。
trans-unit.note: This is the description for a setting

trans-unit.source: Controls the font size in pixels in the debug console.
trans-unit.target: 控制调试控制台中的字体大小(以像素为单位)。

trans-unit.source: Controls the font family in the debug console.
trans-unit.target: 控制调试控制台中的字体系列。

trans-unit.source: Controls the line height in pixels in the debug console. Use 0 to compute the line height from the font size.
trans-unit.target: 设置调试控制台中的行高(以像素为单位)。使用 0 来计算从字体大小开始的行高。

trans-unit.source: Controls if the lines should wrap in the debug console.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否应在调试控制台中换行。

trans-unit.source: Controls if the debug console should suggest previously typed input.
trans-unit.target: 控制调试控制台是否应建议以前键入的输入。

trans-unit.source: Global debug launch configuration. Should be used as an alternative to 'launch.json' that is shared across workspaces.
trans-unit.target: 全局调试启动配置。应当作为跨工作区共享的 \"launch.json\" 的替代方法。
trans-unit.note: This is the description for a setting

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the workbench window should be focused when the debugger breaks.
trans-unit.target: 控制当调试器中断时，工作台窗口是否应获得焦点。

trans-unit.source: Ignore task errors and start debugging.
trans-unit.target: 忽略任务错误并开始调试。

trans-unit.source: Show the Problems view and do not start debugging.
trans-unit.target: 显示"问题"视图，但不开始调试。

trans-unit.source: Controls what to do when errors are encountered after running a preLaunchTask.
trans-unit.target: 控制在运行预启动任务后遇到错误时应该怎么做。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether breakpoints should be shown in the overview ruler.
trans-unit.target: 控制断点是否应显示在概览标尺中。
trans-unit.note: This is the description for a setting

trans-unit.source: Controls whether inline breakpoints candidate decorations should be shown in the editor while debugging.
trans-unit.target: 控制调试时是否应在编辑器中显示内联断点候选修饰。
trans-unit.note: This is the description for a setting

trans-unit.target: 读取 Eval 打印循环面板

trans-unit.source: Please start a debug session to evaluate expressions
trans-unit.target: 请启动调试会话来计算表达式

trans-unit.note: Apply input from the debug console input box

trans-unit.target: REPL 将内容聚焦到筛选器
调试: 复制控制台所有内容

trans-unit.source: [Open a file](command:{0}) which can be debugged or run.

Please do not translate the word "commmand", it is part of our internal syntax which must not change

trans-unit.source: To customize Run and Debug [create a launch.json file](command:{0}).
trans-unit.target: 要自定义运行和调试[创建 launch.json 文件](command:{0})。
trans-unit.note: Please do not translate the word "commmand", it is part of our internal syntax which must not change

trans-unit.source: To customize Run and Debug, [open a folder](command:{0}) and create a launch.json file.
trans-unit.target: 要自定义运行和调试，请[打开文件夹](command:{0}) 并创建一个启动.json 文件。
trans-unit.note: Please do not translate the word "commmand", it is part of our internal syntax which must not change

trans-unit.source: Debug toolbar icon for start debugging.
trans-unit.target: 用于开始调试的调试工具栏图标。
用于暂停的调试工具栏图标。
用于停止的调试工具栏图标。
用于断开连接的调试工具栏图标。
用于重启的调试工具栏图标。

trans-unit.source: Debug toolbar icon for step over.
trans-unit.target: 用于单步执行的调试工具栏图标。

trans-unit.source: Debug toolbar icon for step into.
trans-unit.target: 用于单步执行的调试工具栏图标。

trans-unit.source: Debug toolbar icon for step over.
trans-unit.target: 用于跳过的调试工具栏图标。
用于继续的调试工具栏图标。

trans-unit.source: Debug toolbar icon for step back.
trans-unit.target: 用于后退的调试工具栏图标。

trans-unit.source: Status bar background color when a program is being debugged. The status bar is shown in the bottom of the window
trans-unit.target: 调试程序时状态栏的背景色。状态栏显示在窗口底部

trans-unit.source: Status bar foreground color when a program is being debugged. The status bar is shown in the bottom of the window
trans-unit.target: 调试程序时状态栏的前景色。状态栏显示在窗口底部

trans-unit.source: Status bar border color separating to the sidebar and editor when a program is being debugged. The status bar is shown in the bottom of the window
trans-unit.target: 调试程序时区别于侧边栏和编辑器的状态栏边框颜色。状态栏显示在窗口底部。

trans-unit.source: Unable to resolve the resource without a debug session
trans-unit.target: 无法解析无调试会话的资源

trans-unit.source: Please first open a folder in order to do advanced debug configuration.
trans-unit.target: 请先打开一个文件夹以进行高级调试配置。

trans-unit.source: Select a workspace folder to create a launch.json file in
trans-unit.target: 选择工作区文件夹以在其中创建launch.json文件
调试: 添加条件断点...
调试: 转到下一个断点
按住 Cmd 并单击可访问链接
按住 Ctrl 并单击可访问链接

trans-unit.source: Only primitive values are shown for this object.
trans-unit.target: 仅显示了此对象的基元值。

trans-unit.source: Message to log when breakpoint is hit. Expressions within {} are interpolated. 'Enter' to accept, 'esc' to cancel.
trans-unit.target: 断点命中时记录的消息。{} 内的表达式将被替换。按 "Enter" 键确认，"Esc" 键取消。

trans-unit.source: Break when hit count condition is met. 'Enter' to accept, 'esc' to cancel.
trans-unit.target: 在命中次数条件满足时中断。按 "Enter" 键确认，"Esc" 键取消。

trans-unit.source: Break when expression evaluates to true. 'Enter' to accept, 'esc' to cancel.
trans-unit.target: 在表达式结果为真时中断。按 "Enter" 键确认，"Esc" 键取消。

trans-unit.note: Debug is a noun in this context, not a verb.

trans-unit.source: Object state is captured from first evaluation
trans-unit.target: 对象状态捕获自第一个评估

trans-unit.source: Variable {0} has value {1}, read eval print loop, debug
trans-unit.target: 变量 {0} 具有值 {1}、读取 Eval 打印循环，调试
{0}，读取 Eval 打印循环，调试

trans-unit.source: Repl variable {0} has value {1}, read eval print loop, debug
trans-unit.target: Repl（交互式解释器）变量 {0} 具有值 {1}，读取 求值 输出 循环，调试

trans-unit.target: 调试适配器可执行的“{0}”不存在。

trans-unit.target: 无法确定调试适配器“{0}”的可执行文件。

trans-unit.target: 无法从“{0}”启动调试适配器。

trans-unit.target: 当前光标位置没有关联的可执行代码。

trans-unit.source: Please first open a folder in order to do advanced debug configuration.
trans-unit.target: 请先打开一个文件夹以进行高级调试配置。

trans-unit.target: 此调试类型不支持函数断点

trans-unit.target: 此调试类型不支持数据断点

trans-unit.source: Function breakpoints not supported by this debug type
trans-unit.target: 不受此调试类型支持的函数断点

trans-unit.source: Data breakpoints not supported by this debug type
trans-unit.target: 此调试类型不支持数据断点

trans-unit.note: Debug is a noun in this context, not a verb.

trans-unit.target: 显示另外 {0} 个堆栈帧

trans-unit.source: There is already a debug configuration "{0}" running.
Compound must have "configurations" attribute set in order to start multiple configurations.
trans-unit.target: 复合项必须拥有 "configurations" 属性集，才能启动多个配置。
trans-unit.note: compound indicates a "compounds" configuration item "configurations" is an attribute and should not be localized

trans-unit.source: Could not find launch configuration '{0}' in the workspace.
trans-unit.target: 在工作区中找不到启动配置“{0}”。

trans-unit.source: There are multiple launch configurations '{0}' in the workspace. Use folder name to qualify the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 工作区中存在多个启动配置“{0}”。请使用文件夹名称来限定配置。

trans-unit.source: Can not find folder with name '{0}' for configuration '{1}' in compound '{2}'.
trans-unit.target: 无法在复合项“{2}”中为配置“{1}”找到名为“{0}”的文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Attribute '{0}' has an unsupported value '{1}' in the chosen debug configuration.
trans-unit.target: 所选调试配置的属性“{0}”的值“{1}”不受支持。

trans-unit.source: Attribute '{0}' is missing from the chosen debug configuration.
trans-unit.target: 所选的调试配置缺少属性“{0}”。

trans-unit.source: Configured debug type '{0}' is not supported.
Missing property 'type' for the chosen launch configuration.
trans-unit.target: 所选的启动配置缺少属性 "type"。

trans-unit.source: The active file can not be debugged. Make sure it is saved and that you have a debug extension installed for that file type.
trans-unit.target: 无法调试活动文件。请确保它已保存且你已为该文件类型安装了调试扩展。

trans-unit.source: Debug adapter process has terminated unexpectedly ({0})
trans-unit.target: 调试适配器进程意外终止 ({0})
已添加断点，行 {0}, 文件 {1}

trans-unit.source: Please start a debug session to evaluate expressions
trans-unit.target: 请启动调试会话来计算表达式

trans-unit.note: indicates reason for program being paused

trans-unit.source: Unverified breakpoint. File is modified, please restart debug session.
trans-unit.target: 未验证的断点。对文件进行了修改，请重启调试会话。

trans-unit.source: The preLaunchTask '{0}' terminated with exit code {1}.
Remember my choice in user settings
trans-unit.target: 记住我在用户设置中的选择

trans-unit.source: Task '{0}' can not be referenced from a launch configuration that is in a different workspace folder.
trans-unit.target: 无法在其他工作区文件夹的启动配置中引用任务“{0}”。

trans-unit.source: Could not find the specified task.
The specified task cannot be tracked.
Debugger 'type' can not be omitted and must be of type 'string'.
trans-unit.target: 不可省略调试器的 "type" 属性，且其类型必须是 "string" 。

trans-unit.source: Unable to create 'launch.json' file inside the '.vscode' folder ({0}).
trans-unit.target: 无法在 ".vscode" 文件夹({0})内创建 "launch.json" 文件。

trans-unit.source: No debug adapter, can not send '{0}'
trans-unit.target: 无调试适配器，无法发送"{0}"

trans-unit.source: Session is not ready for breakpoints
trans-unit.target: 会话还没有为断点做好准备

trans-unit.source: Cannot find debug adapter for type '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 找不到类型为 "{0}" 的调试适配器。

trans-unit.source: Use IntelliSense to learn about possible attributes.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IntelliSense 了解相关属性。

trans-unit.source: Hover to view descriptions of existing attributes.
trans-unit.target: 悬停以查看现有属性的描述。
欲了解更多信息，请访问: {0}

trans-unit.source: The debug type is not recognized. Make sure that you have a corresponding debug extension installed and that it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 无法识别此调试类型。确保已经安装并启用相应的调试扩展。

trans-unit.source: "node2" is no longer supported, use "node" instead and set the "protocol" attribute to "inspector".
trans-unit.target: 不再支持 "node2"，改用 "node"，并将 "protocol" 属性设为 "inspector"。

trans-unit.source: Name of configuration; appears in the launch configuration dropdown menu.
trans-unit.target: 配置名称；显示在启动配置下拉菜单中。

trans-unit.source: Request type of configuration. Can be "launch" or "attach".
trans-unit.target: 请求配置类型。可以是“启动”或“附加”。

trans-unit.source: For debug extension development only: if a port is specified VS Code tries to connect to a debug adapter running in server mode
trans-unit.target: 仅用于调试扩展开发: 如果已指定端口，VS 代码会尝试连接到在服务器模式中运行的调试适配器

trans-unit.source: Task to run before debug session starts.
trans-unit.target: 调试会话开始前要运行的任务。

trans-unit.source: Task to run after debug session ends.
trans-unit.target: 调试会话结束后运行的任务。
特定于 Windows 的启动配置属性。

trans-unit.source: OS X specific launch configuration attributes.
trans-unit.target: 特定于 OS X 的启动配置属性。
特定于 Linux 的启动配置属性。

trans-unit.source: No debug adapter, can not start debug session.
trans-unit.target: 没有调试适配器，无法启动调试会话。

trans-unit.source: No debug adapter found. Can not send '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 未找到调试适配器。无法发送"{0}"。

trans-unit.source: Unique identifier for this debug adapter.
trans-unit.target: 此调试适配器的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: Display name for this debug adapter.
trans-unit.target: 显示此调试适配器的名称。

trans-unit.source: Path to the debug adapter program. Path is either absolute or relative to the extension folder.
trans-unit.target: 调试适配器程序的路径。该路径是绝对路径或相对于扩展文件夹的相对路径。

trans-unit.source: Optional arguments to pass to the adapter.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给适配器的可选参数。

trans-unit.source: Optional runtime in case the program attribute is not an executable but requires a runtime.
trans-unit.target: 可选运行时，以防程序属性不可执行，但需要运行时。

trans-unit.source: Mapping from interactive variables (e.g. ${action.pickProcess}) in `launch.json` to a command.
trans-unit.target: 正在将 "launch. json" 中的交互式变量(例如 ${action.pickProcess})映射到命令。
用于生成初始 "launch.json" 的配置。

trans-unit.source: List of languages for which the debug extension could be considered the "default debugger".
trans-unit.target: 可能被视为“默认调试程序”的调试扩展的语言列表。

trans-unit.source: Snippets for adding new configurations in 'launch.json'.
trans-unit.target: 用于在 "launch.json" 中添加新配置的代码段。
用于验证 "launch.json" 的 JSON 架构配置。
用于 Windows 的运行时。
用于 macOS 的运行时。
用于 Linux 的运行时。

trans-unit.source: Presentation options on how to show this configuration in the debug configuration dropdown and the command palette.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何在调试配置下拉列表和命令面板中显示此配置的演示选项。

trans-unit.source: Controls if this configuration should be shown in the configuration dropdown and the command palette.
trans-unit.target: 控制此配置是否应显示在配置下拉列表和命令面板中。

trans-unit.source: Group that this configuration belongs to. Used for grouping and sorting in the configuration dropdown and the command palette.
trans-unit.target: 此配置所属的组。用于在配置下拉列表和命令面板中分组和排序。

trans-unit.source: Order of this configuration within a group. Used for grouping and sorting in the configuration dropdown and the command palette.
trans-unit.target: 此配置在组内的顺序。用于在配置下拉列表和命令面板中分组和排序。

trans-unit.source: List of configurations. Add new configurations or edit existing ones by using IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: 配置列表。使用 IntelliSense 添加新配置或编辑现有配置。

trans-unit.source: List of compounds. Each compound references multiple configurations which will get launched together.
trans-unit.target: 复合列表。每个复合可引用多个配置，这些配置将一起启动。

trans-unit.source: Name of compound. Appears in the launch configuration drop down menu.
trans-unit.target: 复合的名称。在启动配置下拉菜单中显示。

trans-unit.source: Name of folder in which the compound is located.
trans-unit.target: 复合项所在的文件夹的名称。

trans-unit.source: Names of configurations that will be started as part of this compound.
trans-unit.target: 将作为此复合的一部分启动的配置名称。

trans-unit.source: Task to run before any of the compound configurations start.
trans-unit.target: 要在任何复合配置开始之前运行的任务。
